alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Walton, southwestern Holmes and west central Washington Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 240 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of De Funiak Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Union, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Hinsons Crossroads, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad, De Funiak Spring Airport, Eucheeanna, Millers Ferry, Pleasant Ridge, Knox Hill and Argyle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
